seo.headline: Code in any language, anytime, anywhere with Evaluate.
seo.sub_headline: Explore a diverse range of programming languages and tools with our comprehensive online platform. Get started by choosing a language below!
seo.description: Explore a diverse range of programming languages and tools with our comprehensive online platform. Evaluate is the ultimate code evaluation tool, quickly evaluate code snippets in any programming language, with optional input and command-line arguments. Try it now!

internal_error.description: An internal error occurred, please try again later.

not_found.description: The resource you requested could not be found.

capture.description: Create and share images of your source code.

code.description: The source code to appear in the image.

result.backup_service: Preferred service timed out, using backup service.
result.service_down: Capture service is down, please try again later.

evaluate.description: Evaluate any piece of code in any language with optional input and command line arguments.

seo.title: {language_name} on Evaluate
seo.description: Run code in {language_name} and other programming languages effortlessly with Evaluate. Provide your source code, optional input, and command line arguments to receive instant outputs. Debug, optimise, and enhance your coding process by running {language_name} code and exploring various languages. Elevate your programming experience with Evaluate's versatile code evaluation capabilities.

language.description: The programming language to evaluate the code in.

not_found.description: Couldn't find a supported language with that name.

input.description: The input to provide to the program.

args.description: Additional command line arguments to pass to the program.

output.press_run: Press Run to execute the program and see the output here.
output.compile_error: Compilation failed. Please check your code for syntax errors and try again.
output.runtime_error: Runtime error. Please check your code for logical errors and try again.
output.no_output: No output was produced, ensure something was printed to the console.
output.too_long: The output exceeded Discord's display limits. For an unrestricted view, please visit the [Evaluate website]({url}).

evaluate.unauthorised: This is not your evaluation, you'll need to create your own.

copy_url.failed: Failed to copy URL to clipboard!
